sentences.sentence: By switching its beam between neutrinos and antineutrinos, NOVA may be able to glimpse such differences.
sentences.translation: 用过在中微子射线和反中微子射线之间转换，诺娃也许能够观测到这点区别。

sentences.sentence: By switching its beam between neutrinos and antineutrinos, NOVA may be able to glimpse such differences.
sentences.translation: 如果在中微子和反中微子之间切换光束，那么NOVA可能就会发现这种差异。
